title: Oreo Taste Test Challenge (w/Greg Miller) - KF/AF
description:
For $80 off your first month of HelloFresh, go to http://www.HelloFresh.com/MORNING80 and enter MORNING80

Go to http://www.zebit.com/morning for twenty-five hundred dollars of interest-free credit.

Can Greg Miller guess all 10 flavors of Oreo cookies (while Andy and Nick make fun of him)?

Time Stamps - 
00:05:00 - Sink my WarBoat
00:08:43 - Photoshop Challenge: Where's Waldo. A KF member hidden either in actual pictures or in a Where's Waldo page. (Jermey Z)
00:18:12 - Next Week’s Theme: Andy's Tinder Profile Photos (Daniel Ferraro)
00:19:15 - Hello Fresh
00:21:04 - Zebit
00:22:45 - Blind Oreo Taste Test w/Greg
00:50:32 - Ask Andy Anything

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
